titleStmt.title: The King's letter to the general of his army with the general's letter to the Prince of Orange.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: Letters dated: White-Hall, Decemb. 11, 1688, and, Uxbridge, Decemb. 11, 1688.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
